questions.question: How many guests can you accommodate?
Is everything custom?
questions.answer: Yes. Each proposal is designed according to the event, space, and client preferences.

questions.question: Do you offer drop-off menus?
questions.answer: In certain cases. Only when the format allows us to maintain SePrivée's quality and presentation standards.

questions.question: Is tableware and glassware included?
questions.answer: We primarily work with what's available at the client's home. If needed, we can include additional equipment based on each case and budget.

questions.question: Can you accommodate dietary restrictions?
questions.answer: Yes. We design alternatives without losing the coherence of the menu.
